page.title: 12Amy's Diary (continued)
page.content: 11.00am. We came home and watched a programme on T.V. I didn't know what it was called because we started watching it in the middle. It was very good. It was about a brother and sister who were singers and the sister had a very valuable necklace and some men were trying to get it. 12.15pm. We got in the car and went to Bristol. We parked in a multi-storey car park and met Mummy at the Wimpy Bar. (This is a food bar and I had a cheese burger and chips and coke. Yummy!). 1.30pm. We left the Wimpy Bar to buy Rebecca and myself some shoes. We went to a few more shops in town but could not find any shoes to fit me, so we went to Staple Hill. 5.10pm. We found some shoes. They were red and had a strap which you could turn round to make the shoes slip-ons.
